ActionBarTitleCustomDescription: Enter here the custom title that will appear in the header bar instead of "%s".
AdminShortcutsPositionChatInfo_Alert: With this position, it is recommended to show only the options really needed given the limited space available.
AdminShortcutsPositionChatInfo_Desc: The options will be shown in full at the top of the profiles.
AdminShortcutsPositionChatThreeDots_Desc: The options will be shown in the 3 dots menu at the top right of the profile.
AdminShortcutsPositionThreeDots_Desc: The options will be shown in the 3 dots menu at the top right of the chat.
AlternativeNavigation_Desc: Gebruik een andere navigatiestijl bij het navigeren door de app
AlwaysShowDownloads_Desc: The downloads icon will always be shown in the header, even when there are no active items.
AnimatedActionBarn_Desc: Make the action bar transition animation more linear
AppLinkNotVerifiedMessage: For Android 12 and newer, you need to manually add link to verified links in order to open t.me links in OctoGram.
AppTitle_Desc: Customize the appearance of the app
AppearanceHiddenOptions: Some header-related options have been hidden because they are automatically handled by the centered title option.
AreYouSureDeleteXMessages: Are you sure you want to delete the chat history for this user?
AreYouSureDeleteXMessagesMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete the chat history for %d users?
BiometricAskEvery_Desc: Biometric authentication will only be required once every %1$s.
BiometricUnavailable: Many security settings aren't available because the device doesn't support biometric unlocking. If it's enabled, check the system settings.
Camera2Desc: Camera 2 API provides advanced camera features and better control over image capture. It is supported on most modern devices.
CameraButtonPosition_Desc: Choose the position of the camera button
CameraXDesc: CameraX is only supported on selected devices]]>, effects and lenses support depends on your manufacturer.
ChangeIconDesc: Since on Android 12 the monet icon was forced and you upgraded to Android 13, you need to change the app icon to the default one for a better support.
ContextElements_Desc: Pas de elementen in het contextmenu aan
ContributeUsingPbeta_Desc: You can contribute to development by requesting access to our internal testing group! You will have access to all features in preview.
ContributeUsingPbeta_Desc_Already: Thank you for being part of our private beta group! You already have access to all features in preview.
CrashDeleteConfirmation: Wil je één crash log verwijderen? Deze actie is onomkeerbaar
CrashLogInfo: Crash-logs worden lokaal op uw apparaat opgeslagen. U kunt ze naar uw klembord kopiëren of ze verwijderen door lang te klikken.
CrashesDeleteConfirmation: Wil je %s crashlogboeken verwijderen? Deze actie is onomkeerbaar
CrashesUnableToDelete: Kon de %s crash logs niet verwijderen!
CustomEmojiSetHint: Importeer en kies emoji sets uit je interne opslag.
DCStyleMinimal_Desc: The indicator will be shown in minimal style immediately below the user's status.
DCStyleOwlGram_Desc: The indicator will be shown among other information in the style of OwlGram.
DCStyleTelegram_Desc: The indicator will be shown among other information in the style of Telegram.
DatacenterStatusSection_Close_Desc: An activity is running. Do you want to stop it?
DatacenterStatusSection_Desc: Check the Telegram's Datacenter]]> Status in realtime.
DatacenterStatusSection_Desc_Media: Here you can test downloads from different datacenters.
DatacenterStatusSection_Desc_Web: Here you can test pings to different Telegram websites.
DatacenterStatusSection_DwFailed_Discove: Tap here to see the reason
Telegram has imposed a limit on this download as too many requests have been made recently. Please wait a few minutes and try the ping again.
DatacenterStatusSection_Failed: An error occurred during the download attempt. Please try again later.
DatacenterStatusSection_InternetIssue_De: It seems that your network connection isn't stable. Do you want to proceed anyway?
DatacenterStatusSection_Status_Downloads: The test uses a %1$d MB file.
DatacenterStatusSection_TermsAccept: By proceeding, you agree to the DC Status Terms of Service]]>.
DatacenterStatusSection_TestBackend_Desc: Downloads tests aren't available in test backends.
DatacenterStatusSection_WaitPlease_Desc: Please wait some seconds before restarting the activity.
DcIdTypeDescriptionBotapi: It introduces a "-" sign for groups and prepends "-100" for supergroups, broadcast groups, and channels.
DcIdTypeDescriptionTelegram: It shows IDs directly as they are provided by Telegram.
DeleteAccountLastPopup: Wait, let's talk seriously. This is the last popup that appears. Once you confirm this, you will no longer be able to do anything. Are you sure you want to continue?
DeleteAccountLastPopupFailed: In order to verify your identity, you need to set up two-factor authentication.
DeleteAccountStep1Description: You will lose access to all your Saved Messages as well as all messages, media and files from your chats.
DeleteAccountStep2Counter: More than %d channels and groups will be deleted
DeleteAccountStep2Description: The groups and channels you created will either get new admins or become orphaned.
DeleteAccountStep3Counter: More than %d chats with other users will be deleted
DeleteAccountStep3Description:
Your chat partners will keep their message history with you, including the messages you shared in Secret Chats.

You can remove any messages for both sides at any time, but this will not be possible if you delete your account.
DeleteEmojiSetsMessage: Weet je zeker dat je de geselecteerde emoji sets wilt verwijderen?
DeviceIdentifySmartphoneDesc: The interface will be forcibly adapted to a smartphone.
DeviceIdentifyTabletDesc: The interface will be forcibly adapted to a tablet.
DrawerElements_Desc: Pas de elementen in het app-overzicht aan
DrawerFavoriteOptionUnavailable: Since the Settings element is hidden by the drawer elements, the preferred option must necessarily be the settings one.
DrawerHeaderAsBubble_Desc: It will apply a modern touch to the drawer by showing the profile as bubble.
Drawer_Desc: Customize the appearance of the drawer
EmojiSetHint: Dit heeft invloed op het uiterlijk van emoji's. Anderen zien ze op basis van hun voorkeuren.
EmojiSetRemovedInfo: %1$s zit niet meer in je emoji sets.
EnableSmartNotificationsForPrivateChats: Enable smart notifications for private chats
ErrorEmojiFontInvalidFormat: Bestand moet een emoji lettertype bestand zijn.
ErrorSendingCrashContent: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het verzenden van crash logs
ExportDataDescription: Choose a custom name for the file or press share directly to send it to a trusted chat.
ExportDataShareDone: Export file has been sent successfully.
ExportDataShareFailedCustomFileName: The specified file name cannot be used. Try another name.
ExportDataShareFileComment: This file contains all the settings of OctoGram. Press here to set up my own configuration.
FeatureCurrentlyUnavailable: Deze functie is momenteel niet beschikbaar :(
ForcePacmanAnimation_Desc: Forceer pacman animatie bij het archiveren van een chat
HideCustomEmojis_Desc: Verbergt alle aangepaste emojis op het toetsenbord of als een reactie
HideFolder_Alert: Are you sure you want to hide this folder? You can show it from settings.
HideGreetingSticker_Desc: Verbergt de begroetingssticker bij het versturen van een nieuw contact
HideKeyboardOnScroll_Desc: Verbergt het toetsenbord bij het scrollen in de chat
HideOpenButtonChatsList: Hide open button in chats list
HideOtherPhoneNumber_Desc: Verberg het telefoonnummer van anderen van hun profiel
HidePhoneNumber_Desc: Verberg je telefoonnummer van andere gebruikers
HideSendAsChannel_Desc: Verbergt het verzenden als kanaal actie naast het toetsenbord
HideStories_Desc: Je ziet verhalen niet in de hoofdkopregel, maar je kunt ze nog steeds vinden op het profiel van een gebruiker.
HideUnreadCounter_Desc: Hide the unread counter on the folder
ImportReadyDescription: An OctoGram configuration was detected in this file. Keep in mind that this will overwrite your settings. Do you want to proceed with the import?
ImportReadyDescriptionFromExternal: This file, sent by an external user, contains a configuration of OctoGram and may activate unwanted experimental options. Are you sure you want to apply it?
ImportReadyImportDone: %d options have been imported successfully. Restart the app to complete the transfer.
ImportReadyImportFailedDataCaption: The file you selected isn't an OctoGram backup.
ImportReadyImportFailedPickerDescription: File must be an export file.
ImportReadyImportFailedZeroCaption: You must select at least one option in order to proceed with the import.
ImportReadyImportSecureContext: This option contains some privacy and security settings regarding your app. Some parts, such as saved messages, may be restricted by fingerprint authentication. Do you want to import them?
ImportReadyOtherOptions: Another %d unspecified options will be imported automatically.
ImproveIconsDefault_Desc: OctoGram will use the default Telegram icons without any changes.
ImproveIconsMaterialDesign3_Desc: OctoGram will use the Material Design 3 Icons created by Google (more details %s).
ImproveIconsMeme_Desc: Random icons will be used to create the “Meme” effect. The interface may have errors and inconsistencies. This feature is available just in the BETA version of OctoGram!
ImproveIconsSolar_Desc: OctoGram will use the Solar Icons created by  %s (%s).
ImproveInterfaceImmersivePopups_Desc: More beveled edges and more space to display popup content.
IncludeMutedChats_Desc: Include muted chats in the unread message counter.
JumpToNextChannelOrTopic_Desc: Allows to swipe up from a channel / topic to jump to next one
LiteModeSyncBatterySaverInfo: You can choose to synchronize OctoGram's power-saving mode with your device's power-saving mode.
LockedAccounts_HideFromList_Desc: You can access hidden chats by long pressing on your profile in the drawer.
LockedAccounts_Migration_Desc: All your accounts can now be secured effortlessly with your fingerprint — fast, safe, and seamless. Double Bottom is now Locked Accounts, integrated into the all-new privacy settings. Tap below to learn more!
LockedChatsHelpDescription: Lock chats using the three-dot menu in-chat or in the chat list to view them here. **Tap to config >**
LockedChatsHelpDescription_Settings: You can lock chats using the three-dot menu in-chat, in the chat list, or by pressing the button below. To view locked chats, long press on the action bar in the dialogs page.
LockedChatsHelpHint1Description: You can choose to hide or show each chat individually.
LockedChatsHelpHint2Description: Only you can view the content of these chats by unlocking it with your fingerprint or face.
LockedChatsHelpHint3Description: Hidden chats will be displayed normally on other devices.
MaxDragAndDropFileCount: You cannot add more than %s photos/video!
MenuItemsOrderDesc: Customize side menu items to better meet your needs.
MonetIconDesc: Use Material You's dynamic icon on Android 12
MutualContactDesc: **%s** en je hebt elkaar aan de lijst met contactpersonen toegevoegd.
NavigationDiscardReload: You have changed some navigation settings. Do you want to apply the changes?
NavigationPreviewPage1: Click anywhere in the preview to open a new page and check the smoothness
NavigationPreviewPage2: Try scrolling using gestures to try the animated action bar
OctoAppearanceSettingsHeader: Maak telegram je eigen door de instellingen hieronder aan te passen
OctoCameraSettingsHeader: Hier kunt u uw camera-ervaring aanpassen met de app
OctoCrashedSubTitle: Oktober Gram is gecrasht, en het spijt ons voor de problemen. Rapporteer deze crash alstublieft door naar het tabblad "Crash Geschiedenis" te gaan in de instellingen van oktober.
OctoExperimentsDialogMessage: Deze functies zijn experimenteel en werken mogelijk niet zoals verwacht. Je kunt crashes en andere problemen ervaren. Rapporteer alle problemen die je tegenkomt aan de ontwikkelaars
OctoExperimentsSettingsHeader: Probeer nieuwe en glanzende functies uit
OctoGeneralSettingsHeader: Here you can customize your general experience with the app
OctoMainSettingsHeader: Welkom bij de Oktober-instellingen! Hier kunt u uw ervaring aanpassen met de app
OctoPrivacySettingsHeader: Here you can customize some privacy settings related to the app
OctoTgBrowserNoPrompt: Enter a domain for which confirmation will not be asked before opening.
OctoTgBrowserNoPromptDesc: Telegram will always open links from these websites without asking for confirmation.
OctoTgBrowserOpenFail_Desc: The selected operation is not available because the in-app browser has been disabled.
OpenArchiveOnPull: Schuif naar beneden om het archief te openen
OpenArchiveOnPull_Desc: Open het archief automatisch bij omlaag trekken
PencilIconForEdited_Desc: Dit vervangt de tekst "Bewerkt" door een potloodpictogram
PerformanceModeDesc: CameraX's quality will be reduced in favor of performance
PerformanceMode_Desc: Schakel de prestatiemodus voor CameraX in. Dit vermindert de kwaliteit van de gemaakte foto's
PinnedEmojisList_Description: You can pin emojis from any pack.
PinnedEmojisList_HideRecent_Desc: You can hide the list of recent emoji and show only the pinned ones by activating this option.
PinnedEmojisList_Limit: You can select up to 25 emojis.
PinnedHashtags_Apply_Dialog: You have changed the list of hashtags. Apply changes?
PinnedHashtags_Description: You can pin any hashtag you want to find it easily.
PinnedHashtags_Input_Desc: To pin a new hashtag, write the name and press enter on the keyboard.
PinnedHashtags_Limit: You can select up to 10 hashtags.
PinnedReactions_Description: You can pin reactions from any pack.
PinnedReactions_Description_Channels: You can pin just default reactions.
PinnedReactions_Limit: You can select up to 5 reactions.
PlayGifsAsVideo_Desc: Sta toe om gifs af te spelen als videobestanden
PrivacyPolicyLogin:
By continuing,
you agree to the *Privacy Policy*.
PromptBeforeSendingGIF: Are you sure you want to send this GIF?
PromptBeforeSendingSticker: Are you sure you want to send this sticker?
QuickShareEnabled_Desc: Tap and hold the share button to quickly share messages from any chat.
ResetSettingsBackupFailed: An error occurred during backup generation and the settings were not reset.
ResetSettingsDescription:
Are you really sure you want to reset all OctoGram settings? Any options applied will not be retained after restart.

Keep in mind that before resetting, you may want to make a backup so that you can recover these settings in the future.
ResetSettingsDescriptionExperimental: Are you really sure you want to reset all the Experimental OctoGram settings? Any options applied will not be retained after restart.
RestartAppToApplyChanges: Herstart de app om wijzigingen toe te passen.
SelectElement_Desc: Tap an item on this page to share the direct link
SendCrashLogDone: Crash log has been sent successfully.
ShowFakePhoneNumber_Desc: Toon een nep telefoonnummer in je profiel. Dit nep telefoonnummer wordt alleen aan uzelf getoond! Als u de privacy van uw telefoon uitschakelt, zullen mensen uw echte telefoonnummer zien
ShowMessagesCounter_Desc: Show the unread message count instead of the unread chat count.
ShowOnlineStatus_Desc: Toont de online status van andere mensen naast hun profielfoto in groepen
ShowRegistrationDate_Desc: Toon registratiedatum van gebruiker in profielen. Merk op dat dit wordt bereikt door te raden zodat het onjuiste resultaten kan laten zien
ShowUserIconsInChatsList: Show user icons in chats list
ShowUserIconsInChatsList_Desc: Show user icons in chats list near sender name in groups.
ShowUsernameAsPhoneNumber_Desc: Toon je gebruikersnaam als telefoonnummer in je profiel. Dit wordt alleen aan jezelf getoond!
SlidingTitle_Desc: De titel schuift naar het scherm wanneer het te lang is
SmartNotificationsPvtDialogMessage:
This option is, by default, disabled on the official Telegram clients and therefore in private chats all notifications were sent with sound or vibration.

By enabling it, the behavior of notifications will vary in all chats: as well as in groups, all private chats will default to 2 notifications every 3 minutes.
SmartNotificationsPvtDialogMessagePlus: You can manage this option from OctoGram settings.
SmootherNavigation_Desc: Choose the fluidity of individual screens in the app
StartWithRearCamera_Desc: Start het opnemen van video-berichten met de achterste camera in plaats van de camera aan de voorkant
StickerSizePreviewMessage1: Oh, I love OctoGram 🐙! I just learned today that it's Italian, how cool!
StickerSizePreviewMessage2: In Italy, they say the pizza 🍕 is really good… When are we going?
StickerSizePreviewMessage5: I love the new OctoGram update!
StickerSizePreviewMessage6: Cool! I'm going to try it out now!
StickersSizeChannelTitle: OctoGram Channel - News and tips for your client
SwipeToPIP_Desc: Swipe up on a video to enter Picture-in-Picture mode.
SystemCameraDesc: Access directly the system camera (not applicable for video messages).
TestBackendOff: Dit account zal verbinding maken met de productie backend.
TestBackendOn: Dit account zal verbinding maken met de test backend.
ThisAccountLocked_Desc: Unlock your account with biometrics or switch to a different account.
ThisAccountLocked_Logout_Desc: Logging out of the account is the only way if you can't remember the password.
TranscriptionTooLong: This voice message is too long.
TranslateEntireChatDescription: You can choose to show the button to translate an entire chat.
TranslatorEntireUnavailable: This feature is not available with the selected provider because you do not have a Telegram Premium subscription.
TranslatorHeader: Customize the integrated message translation experience
TranslatorHeaderLong: You can customize the integrated message translation experience in OctoGram settings.
TranslatorMinimized: Translator bar has been minimized for this chat.
TranslatorMinimizedChannel: Translator bar has been minimized for this channel.
TranslatorMinimizedGroup: Translator bar has been minimized for this group.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedAccurate: It's very accurate but not recommended because of high limits.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedGeneral: It's the fastest provider but may resort to translation errors.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedLingo: It's very limited, but more reliable for some languages.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedPremium: Recommended if the account has a Telegram Premium subscription.
TranslatorProviderUnsuggested: It doesn't support the language currently set.
TranslatorProviderUnsupported: The currently set language (%s) is not supported by the selected provider.
TranslatorProviderUnsupportedDialogs: The translation target language of some chats has been changed because the previously set language is not supported by the selected provider.
TranslatorUnsupportedLanguage: Selected language isn't supported by the selected provider.
UnlockedHiddenChupaIcon: Je bent opgepakt! Chupa's pictogram is nu beschikbaar in de instellingen.
UnlockedHiddenConfettiIcon: You have unlocked confetti! Activate the new secret icon from settings.
UnlockedHiddenFoxIcon: You have unlocked the shy fox icon! Activate it from settings.
UnlockedHiddenYukiIcon: Hehe, je hebt me gevonden ~. Ga naar instellingen en verander het pictogram!
UnmuteWithVolumeDown: Dempen van video's inschakelen met volume omlaag
UnmuteWithVolumeDown_Desc: Video dempen door op het volume omlaag te drukken
UpdatesPbetaWarning: Please note that the update you are installing is part of the private beta program you joined and may have instabilities. If so, please report it in our official internal testing group.
UpdatesSettingsAutoDescription: If enabled, server will notify the app when to check for new updates.
UpdatesSettingsAutoDownloadAlwaysDesc: An OctoGram update uses approximately 80 MB. Additional costs may be charged by your phone company.
UpdatesSettingsCheckFailed: An error occurred while checking for updates. Please try again later.
UpdatesSettingsCheckUpdated: You are using the latest version available.
UpdatesSettingsHeader: Stay up to date with the latest news from OctoGram.
UpdatesSettingsPbetaDescription:
Your main account is part of OctoGram's private beta program.

By activating this option, you can receive updates from the private beta program directly via OTA like other stable and beta updates, but some updates settings (like "%s") will be forcibly activated.
UseCameraX_Desc: Gebruik CameraX in plaats van de oudere API
UseCustomDeviceNameDescription: Enter below the name you want to associate with this device. You can also choose to use the default name.
UseQualityPreset_Dynamic_Desc: It will use the lower quality only if you are not using Wi-Fi.
UseQualityPreset_HighQuality_Desc: It automatically selects the highest quality when you watch a video or story.
UseQualityPreset_LowQuality_Desc: It automatically selects the lowest quality when you watch a video or story.
UseSystemEmojisDesc: Gebruik de emoji van het systeem in plaats van de gekozen
VoiceImprovements_Desc: Zet ruisonderdrukking en spraaknormalisatie aan tijdens een gesprek
